author: lundblad
msg: Merge r11486 from trunk to 1.1.x branch.
Fix a compiler error on IRIX (Issue #2082).
N_(x) was improperly defined as (x) which creates problems with using it in the
context of a character array initilization.  The C standard doesn't allow
parenthesis around a string constant being used to initialize a character array.

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r11222 from trunk to 1.1.x branch.
Finish issue #2071 (un-XML-safe author names causing failed MERGE),
and escape datestrings while I'm at it (just in case).
